name: SigmaGrid Fair Value Signals
description: Institutional fundamentals API for synthetic-equity perpetuals (SPY-PERP, QQQ-PERP, TSLA-PERP, etc.). Returns fair value, regime, drift, events, and arbitrage signals. Public docs live now — Paid API launching Q1 2026.
author: SigmaGrid

status.note: Responses currently use placeholder data for integration testing. Real institutional signals launch Q1 2026.

tools.name: sigmagrid_fair_value
tools.description: Get institutional-grade fair value estimate for a synthetic equity perpetual. Returns fair value, confidence score, and per-venue premium/discount in basis points. Use when an agent needs to know if a perp is trading rich or cheap vs fundamentals.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: Ticker symbol (SPY, QQQ, IWM, AAPL, MSFT, GOOGL, AMZN, META, NVDA, TSLA)

tools.name: sigmagrid_spreads
tools.description: Cross-venue spread analysis for a synthetic equity perpetual. Identifies cheapest and richest venue, calculates spread in basis points, and flags arbitrage opportunities. Use for cross-venue trading decisions.

tools.name: sigmagrid_funding
tools.description: Funding rate analysis with anomaly detection. Returns per-venue funding rates, z-scores vs rolling history, and mean reversion probability. Use for carry trade and mean-reversion strategies.

tools.name: sigmagrid_regime
tools.description: Market regime classification. Returns current regime (risk_on, risk_off, transitioning) with confidence score, VIX level, and funding direction. Use for position sizing and risk management.

tools.name: sigmagrid_events
tools.description: Event risk analysis for a ticker. Flags upcoming catalysts (earnings, macro events), shows historical average moves, and assesses whether current perp pricing reflects the risk. Use before holding positions through events.

pricing.note: Pricing varies based on endpoint complexity. Snapshot endpoint offers batch discount.

payment_info.payment_flow: HTTP 402 → Agent pays on Base → Retry with tx_hash → Get data

testing.description: All endpoints currently return test/placeholder data with production-ready schema. Free validation endpoint available for connectivity checks. Real institutional signals launch Q1 2026.
